Detailed Description

Abstract superclass to all SMS sender/receivers.

virtual char* SMSTalker::getPhoneNumber (  int  phoneNumberNumber  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Get the string contating the given phonenumber.

Returns:
Phone number number phoneNumberNumber. If phoneNumberNumber is too large NULL is returned.

virtual bool SMSTalker::init (  SMSProcessor *  processor  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Initializes the SMSTalker.

Copies the processor to m_processor. Override this method in the subclasses.

Returns:
True.

Reimplemented in CIMDSMSTalker, DummySMSTalker, GM12SMSTalker, HayesSMSTalker, and XMLSMSTalker.

bool SMSTalker::logLine (  bool  sending,
const char *  senderPhone,
const char *  recipientPhone,
int  nbrBytes,
const byte *  contents
) 
 

Puts a line in the logfile.

Parameters:
senderPhone Sender phone number.
recipientPhone Recipient phone number.
nbrBytes The number of bytes in the message.
contents The message.
Returns:
True if succesfully written to the file.

Reimplemented in CIMDSMSTalker.
